interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit 2 Colors Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils, 1 Brush and 1 Razor, Dark Brown and Light Brown
Review Date: 2021/11/26
Store: Marine Forest
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.67 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ES7010-2brown', 'UPC': '762403888318'}
Review Text: It works fine and the stencils are made well, but the powders themselves are weirdly colored- one is too dark and the other is almost orange. If you have really dark hair one side of the powder may work well for you but it applies almost like a marker (I did pat it on as you’re supposed to), and I prefer a more natural look.
Review Title: Okay but powders are too dark
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE PURELEOR {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'} Pros: it came with everything pictured, a lash applicator, the tube of “eyeliner glue” and 5 pairs of lashes in varying thickness. The box itself was nicely packaged. For reference, I used the thinnest/most natural pair at the top for my review.

Cons: the tube of eyeliner was either sitting so long it completely dried up, or the glue caused the eyeliner to adhere to the inside of the tube, but it was almost impossible to get ANY of the liner on my lid.

When I finally got a line to go on, it was akin to what attempting to using a dried up Expo on whiteboard looks like- I had to scrub the pen on my eyelid in an attempt to lay down any product at all, resulting in a very pitiful looking eyeliner application.

I fixed the lashes to the appropriate area, and within 5 minutes they were coming off at the corners. I tried to remedy the overall result somewhat by adding my own liner, and that example is on the second photo, bottom right corner (photo with eyeshadow applied).

The lashes themselves were the quality you’d expect from a multi pack at this price. Some of the individual lashes had fallen out as I opened the package as well.

Final thoughts: just use eyelash glue and get quality lashes. It doesn’t take any more time to apply and at least you can apply eyeliner to suit your taste. Glue + Eyeliner probably shouldn’t mix 7JHH WIGS Long Wavy Curly Wig With Bangs Natural Hair Dye Wig for Women (25inch, Red) 7JHH WIGS {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '13.78 x 8.66 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Brand': '7JHH WIGS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '13.78 x 8.66 x 1.57 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '682601933330'} This wig is nice but a little thin, the value for money is great though. The bangs especially are really cute if you get them positioned correctly. Nice wig, a little thin OULAC Shine to Shine Velvet Matte Lipstick, Long Lasting Creamy Formula, Opaque Finish, Vegan Friendly, 3.6 grams / 0.12 ounces, Cranberries (Y09) Oulac {'Brand': 'Oulac', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 0.68 x 0.68 inches; 1.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'velvet-matte-Y09'} This lipstick is gorgeous! Applies very easily and comes in a steel lipstick container that seems very durable. Super cute packaging and the product goes on without issue. It does smudge some but as it’s not a matte product that’s to be expected, it’s also not drying and feels great on the lips for all day wear. Beautiful, vibrant colors with nice smell OULAC Blush Mono 4.8g/0.16oz (One More time) OUL'AC ['Smooth Glide', ': A silky, superfine blush delivers a burst of buildable colors that are designed for every skin tone. Vitamin E acts as an essential emollient with antioxidant properties to restore flexibility, prevent dryness and color-fading.', 'Natural Finish', ': The richly-pigmented, long-lasting formula glides seamlessly on the skin and easily blends for an irresistibly radiant, healthy-looking complexion.', 'Intense Payoff', ': Mineral pigments allow for high color payoff and smooth application, while micronized powder ensures excellent blendability and a true matte finish. Vegan Friendly!'] {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Coverage': 'Buildable', 'Brand': "OUL'AC", 'Skin Tone': 'All'} This blush is beautiful! It’s a soft pink color that goes on easily and is smooth and creamy when applying. It’s easy to build the color up to the desired effect and stays on without fading for hours. Absolutely gorgeous blush, buildable color AISI QUEENS Black Wigs for Women Long Wavy Curly Synthetic Lace Front Wig Middle Part Body Wavy Hair Replacement Wigs Heat Resistant Fibers for Daily Party Use AISI QUEENS {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Package Dimensions': '10.75 x 9.09 x 2.72 inches; 11.36 Ounces'} I love this lace front wig, it came with wig caps and was easy to trim the lace where I needed it. This would be a great wig for daily wear or cosplay, if you’re doing daily wear I’d suggest thinning it a little unless you like the fuller appearance. On me it looks like too much volume so i used thinning scissors and corrected that and then was able to apply the wig and wear it without issue! It looks great and realistic. Cute wig for a great price, easy to wear Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit 2 Colors Waterproof and Long Lasting One Step Easy Color Brow Stamp with 24 Eyebrow Stencils, 1 Brush and 1 Razor, Dark Brown and Light Brown Marine Forest {'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.65 x 0.67 x 0.67 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ES7010-2brown', 'UPC': '762403888318'} It works fine and the stencils are made well, but the powders themselves are weirdly colored- one is too dark and the other is almost orange. If you have really dark hair one side of the powder may work well for you but it applies almost like a marker (I did pat it on as you’re supposed to), and I prefer a more natural look. Okay but powders are too dark
profile:
The user maintains a strong interest in beauty products that prioritize practicality and usability, focusing on categories such as eyelashes, eyeliner, and lip products. They have a clear preference for convenient, self-adhesive items, though they often opt for traditional adhesives due to past performance issues. Their appreciation for diverse styles and attractive packaging is tempered by a critical focus on quality and functionality, ensuring they are willing to invest in products that meet high standards regardless of cost.

Recently, the user has expanded their interests to hair products, particularly wigs, valuing realistic designs and ease of customization for everyday wear. Their ongoing exploration of lip products continues to yield positive results in terms of application ease and durability, despite minor smudging experiences. A new addition to their routine, blush, aligns with their desire for effective, luxurious beauty solutions with a focus on smooth application, buildable coverage, and lasting finish.

Their latest interaction with an eyebrow product highlights an ongoing exploration of brow grooming solutions. While they appreciate the quality of the stencils and ease of use, they encountered some issues with the powder colors, which do not align with their desire for a natural look. This evolving pattern emphasizes their commitment to beauty products that seamlessly blend aesthetics with functionality, providing comfort and usability while remaining open to innovative solutions that meet their expectations.
